lesson_title: Business Phone Calls - Making and Receiving Calls

data.title: Vocabulary: Transferring
data.content: Transferring means connecting a caller to another person or department. In business phone calls, you might transfer calls when the requested person handles a specific area or when redirecting to the appropriate department.

data.target_phrase: [Company Name], this is [Your Name]. How can I help you?
data.expected_transcript: this is how can I help you
data.instruction: Repeat after me. Fill in [Company Name] and [Your Name] with your own information.
data.note: Flexible matching - focus on professional structure

data.text: Hello, this is Sarah Chen from ABC Company. I'm calling regarding your inquiry.
data.expected_transcript: Hello this is from I'm calling regarding your inquiry
data.instruction: Shadow speak this phone call opening. Focus on clear pronunciation - no visual cues on phone calls.

data.target_phrase: Just to confirm, the meeting is at 3 PM tomorrow. Is that correct?
data.expected_transcript: Just to confirm the meeting is at 3 PM tomorrow is that correct
data.instruction: Repeat after me. Practice confirming information clearly on phone calls.

expected_responses: I'm sorry is not available can I take a message
is not available right now would you like me to take a message
is away from their desk can I have them call you back
data.instruction: The caller asks for someone who is not available. Offer to take a message professionally.

data.target_phrase: I'm sorry, the line is breaking up. Could you repeat that, please?
data.expected_transcript: I'm sorry the line is breaking up could you repeat that please
data.instruction: Repeat after me. Practice handling phone connection problems professionally.

data.text: Thank you for calling. Is there anything else I can help you with? Have a great day!
data.expected_transcript: Thank you for calling is there anything else I can help you with have a great day
data.instruction: Practice ending phone calls professionally. Shadow speak along with me.

expected_responses: Good morning this is thank you for calling how can I help you
Just to confirm that's is that correct
Thank you for calling have a great day
data.instruction: Complete the phone call scenario. Answer professionally, confirm information, and end politely.

data.question: When you can't hear clearly on a phone call, what should you do?
options: Ask them to repeat or speak louder
Hang up and hope they call back
data.explanation: Always ask the caller to repeat themselves or speak louder. This shows professionalism and ensures you get accurate information. Guessing can lead to costly mistakes.
